document_type: Final Determination Notification and Payroll Forms
security: The document includes Social Security numbers, the public disclosure of which could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy. The redaction is made because this invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding HSCA staff payroll records, specifically concerning Kenneth G. Grant. It details the postponement of certain information (Social Security numbers) due to privacy concerns and includes payroll authorization forms and related correspondence.
summary_one_paragraph: This document encompasses a Final Determination Notification concerning the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) staff payroll records, specifically those of Kenneth G. Grant. The Review Board has postponed the release of Grant's and potentially other staff members' Social Security numbers to prevent an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy. Accompanying this notification are payroll authorization forms for Kenneth G. Grant, dated July and August 1977, indicating his appointment as a Staff Investigator with a $24,000 annual salary, along with internal memoranda regarding payroll certification and Grant's forwarding address.
title: Final Determination Notification Regarding HSCA Staff Payroll Records
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
